title: [UPDATE 3] **Brackets Announced**OCE 1v1 Tournament! 11th of January, OPEN TO ALL!
body:
**Check out who you will be vs'ing in Round 1!**
http://binarybeast.com/xLoL1412150
____
Rules -
Tournament begins 11th of January (Sunday) at 1pm NZT/11am AEST/10am QLD
You MUST be in the "Mysticnz" chat room in LoL 30minutes before the first round to make sure everyone is present for the tournament.

To win your match you must do **ONE** of the following:
1. Get first blood on your opponent
2. Get to 100 CS First
3. Destroy your opponents FIRST mid tower

Any questions feel free to join the MysticNZ chat room and ask, we will start streaming 1 hour prior to the first round at twitch.tv/tbtv_mysticnz.
HEAPS of prizes including RP and Pizza to giveaway during the tournament to viewers on the stream!

-Mysticnz

replies.body: Hey Mysticnz does my tournament name have to be the same as my ingame name?

Lol good luck.
I'm a versing a pretty good player too.
